Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many reasons to worry; the evening news is full of them

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: Consider trade protectionism. It's been tried - and found wanting - since the Great Depression

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what it is like to feel vulnerable and fearful during a difficult time

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: We're a robust democracy here. That's the wonderful thing about this country

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: I can tell you I love California - and no more

Quote.Author: Elaine Chao
Quote.QuoteValue: My first port of call was Los Angeles. That's where I laid my first foot on America

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be very, very good looking to get ahead in motion pictures

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: I like glasses so I can go out without my makeup. Just grab your coat and get your hat and go

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something that really frightens me - and that's fear

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: Diabetes is a lousy, lousy disease

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the most interesting New Yorkers are the people who were not born here

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: As a diabetic, I'm a walking picnic. I have to eat measured amounts of food at certain times

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm playing comedy, it is such a crap shoot of what will work and what won't

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: Audiences are not strangers to me. They're the best friends I've got in my life

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: There will always be ladies who lunch. Always. And apparently they live a long time

Quote.Author: Elaine Stritch
Quote.QuoteValue: Making clever speeches takes a lot of work and a lot of time

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: We have wild animals in zoos, yet people rarely meet their 'food' face to face

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: When the sun comes up, I have morals again

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever notice that Soup for One is eight aisles away from Party Mix?

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: To listen to your own silence is the key to comedy

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: You never see a man walking down the street with a woman who has a little potbelly and a bald spot

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what men want. Men want to be really, really close to someone who will leave them alone

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, if you need 100 rounds to kill a deer, maybe hunting isn't your sport

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: Pigs are smarter than dogs, and both are smarter than Congress

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: My fashion philosophy is, if you're not covered in dog hair, your life is empty

Quote.Author: Elayne Boosler
Quote.QuoteValue: Horse racing is waning in popularity

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: He who does not understand your silence will probably not understand your words

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: Positive anything is better than negative nothing

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars

Quote.Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote.QuoteValue: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: The inability to delegate is one of the biggest problems I see with managers at all levels

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: Every artist is unreasonable, because he or she is doing something that hasn't been done before

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have great teachers, but if you don't have a good principal, you won't have a good school

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always believed that every great city in history needs a vibrant center

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: Philanthropy is activism

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: Any city in America would like to get a museum built if they didn't have to pay for it

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: A real collector does not sell

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a big ego, I admit it; I'm ego-driven

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather be respected than loved

Quote.Author: Eli Broad
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything I do, I spend a lot of time. I do it with passion and intensity. I want to be in charge

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Las Vegas is a 24-hour city. It never stops

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always dreamed of having a year-round haunted house

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Much of my youth was spent in the parking lot or inside a Dunkin' Donuts

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you're the first to speak out against something, there's going to be a backlash

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: The scariest people are usually the sweetest

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I was the neighbourhood baby-sitter - very responsible, always in charge

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no tattoos. There's nothing I've even been that into to get a tattoo of it

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: When people direct insults at me, I can take it

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Horror movies are the best date movies. There's no wondering, 'When do I put my arm around her?'

Quote.Author: Eli Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone throws up while watching one of your movies, it's like a standing ovation

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: When you write down your life, every page should contain something no one has ever heard about

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter how new an idea is: what matters is how new it becomes

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: As if one could know the good a person is capable of, when one doesn't know the bad he might do

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: One should not confuse the craving for life with endorsement of it

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Rulers who want to unleash war know very well that they must procure or invent a first victim

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: People's fates are simplified by their names

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Most religions do not make men better, only warier

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: Success listens only to applause. To all else it is deaf

Quote.Author: Elias Canetti
Quote.QuoteValue: People love as self-recognition what they hate as an accusation

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Public speaking? I speak to myself on the street!

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care about motivation. I care about credibility

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I have disappointed and failed to live up to the standard I expected of myself

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Delay is the enemy of progress

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who are critical of Alliance are the same people who have done nothing for 30 years

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time to let science and medicine, not politics and rhetoric, lead us to good, sound policy

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes in politics, you think you've seen it all. Turns out I was wrong

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like politicians who vacillate

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics you learn to always smile

Quote.Author: Eliot Spitzer
Quote.QuoteValue: My career was obviously cut shorter than I wanted it to be

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - We often assume that if we are good people we will not suffer the ills of the world

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - The truth does not need to be defended

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - I only believe in what I see and hear with my own eyes and ears

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - The only incontrovertible fact of my work is the importance of life

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - Death is not painful. It is the most beautiful experience you will have

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - Love is really the only thing we can possess, keep with us, and take with us

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - Death is staring too long into the burning sun and the relief of entering a cool, dark room

Quote.Author: Elisabeth Kuble
Quote.QuoteValue: oss - Those who learned to know death, rather than to fear and fight it, become our teachers about life

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: There is definitely something sexy about a girl with an attitude and a pair of leather pants

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: The letters from jail are always disconcerting

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm self-confident and not afraid to speak my mind

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised in Boston by three older brothers and a very strong and empowering single mom

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: TV can be a long commitment

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is this liberal, feminist, Mormon powerhouse. I just love her to death

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a more mature actress now

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't let guys do hickeys. That's like a dog marking his territory or something

Quote.Author: Eliza Dushku
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I really am probably one of the sweetest, most sensitive people you'll ever meet

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Normally for photo shoots I get a full wax, some tanning, a facial

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Klutziness is endearing. I like imperfection

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my coffee light

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually think that secrets are just a part of human nature and that everybody should have some

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I love physical comedy. I love Oscar Wilde, I love Shakespeare comedies, I love improv

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Every once in a while I play a true idiot, and they're really fun to play

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: Most men I know rely on women to do all the literal dirty work

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: When you live in a leading lady's body, which I do, you have to constantly prove that you are funny

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: The sexism in Hollywood is not particularly overt - because the system is good at hiding it

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Banks
Quote.QuoteValue: I played softball. I was on an all-star team. I traveled with the team. I loved it

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: Light tomorrow with today!

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: Who so loves believes the impossible

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: How do I love thee? Let me count the ways

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: And each man stands with his face in the light. Of his own drawn sword, ready to do what a hero can

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: What I do and what I dream include thee, as the wine must taste of its own grapes

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: Suddenly, as rare things will, it vanished

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: Since when was genius found respectable?

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote.QuoteValue: If you desire faith, then you have faith enough

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: No object is mysterious. The mystery is your eye

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look at life one way, there is always cause for alarm

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Fate is not an eagle, it creeps like a rat

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is one thing that can go on mattering once it has stopped hurting

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody speaks the truth when there is something they must have

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: Intimacies between women often go backwards, beginning in revelations and ending in small talk

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Bowen
Quote.QuoteValue: We are minor in everything but our passions

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men and women are created equal

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: The best protection any woman can have... is courage

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-development is a higher duty than self-sacrifice

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing strengthens the judgment and quickens the conscience like individual responsibility

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: The Bible and the Church have been the greatest stumbling blocks in the way of women's emancipation

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: I am always busy, which is perhaps the chief reason why I am always well

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: To make laws that man cannot, and will not obey, serves to bring all law into contempt

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: The heyday of woman's life is the shady side of fifty

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
Quote.QuoteValue: Woman's discontent increases in exact proportion to her development

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: You recognize a survivor when you see one. You recognize a fighter when you see one

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why someone else's marriage has anything to do with me

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all going to die

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe we all change over time

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: Brave people are the firemen who run into the burning building. That's brave

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually one of those people who get up energetic in the morning

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: I think self-knowledge is the rarest trait in a human being

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: Honestly, I get energized by the crowds. They feed me emotionally

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Edwards
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is this great big blackboard, and on it you write all the things that you do

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: We still have work to do in our efforts to advance equal rights for all Americans

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: Our country has been the leading provider of humanitarian aid for refugees

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: We can and must do our part to increase the number of Syrian refugees being resettled in the U.S

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: You are who you are, and in politics, if you stay who you are, you do better

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to believe in something strongly enough that you would lose your seat over it

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is able to give to someone

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: We need more access to quality health care, not less

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: Elections are about choices, and part of what you do is draw that contrast

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked New England

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Esty
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm out and around all the time

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not tell secrets to those whose faith and silence you have not already tested

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: God forgive you, but I never can

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the heart of a man, not a woman, and I am not afraid of anything

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: A clear and innocent conscience fears nothing

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: If thy heart fails thee, climb not at all

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: All my possessions for a moment of time

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: The past cannot be cured

Quote.Author: Elizabeth I
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool too late bewares when all the peril is past

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I get way too much happiness from good food

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to date a chef. I'd probably get really fat, but I don't care

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I wouldn't want the paparazzi ever following me in my life

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every day you try to soak up as much as you can to learn and understand things better

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Sun Also Rises' by Ernest Hemingway is my favorite book. You feel manly reading it

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's interesting to watch myself with an audience; I'm trying hard to learn from it

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The tabloids create their own stories about people's lives that don't exist

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the curvy one of the family

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved being a student

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Olsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I always went to see independent films, they're the movies I'm usually most excited to see

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Big girls need big diamonds

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always admitted that I'm ruled by my passions

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: When people say, 'She's got everything', I've got one answer - I haven't had tomorrow

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: So much to do, so little done, such things to be

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I fell off my pink cloud with a thud

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a survivor - a living example of what people can go through and survive

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a woman's body and a child's emotions

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the having, it's the getting

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything makes me nervous - except making films

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Truly successful lives are about family

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Consumer banking - selling debt to middle class families - has been a gold mine

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't go out and tell ourselves we've done good if we haven't

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what I am in Washington to do: I'm here to fight for hardworking families

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't make me happy to go back and talk about how great high school was

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: I never sought nor gained personal benefit in school or job applications based on my heritage

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: America's middle class is getting hammered, and Washington is rigged to work for the big guy

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot run a democracy without a strong middle class

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: Credit cards are like snakes: Handle 'em long enough, and one will bite you

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Warren
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want happy-face conclusions. I want the truth

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am baffled by men. When they want me, I don't want them; when I want them, they don't want me

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a hopeless, shameless flirt

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: In a strange way, I had fallen in love with my depression

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, single women are the most vulnerable adults. In movies, they are given imaginary power

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't even have to hate to have a perfectly miserable time

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything's plastic, we're all gonna die

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: My life's actually been quite dull; it's not all that glamorous

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism is a good venue for getting yourself across as much as for getting your point across

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd really like to write a book about Timothy McVeigh, but it would only work if he cooperated

Quote.Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel
Quote.QuoteValue: Because trying to see all sides, such an instinct is particularly Jewish

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: A weed is but an unloved flower

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: To sin by silence, when we should protest, Makes cowards out of men

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: With every deed you are sowing a seed, though the harvest you may not see

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: The spark divine dwells in thee: let it grow

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Tis the set of the sail that decides the goal, and not the storm of life

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: Love lights more fires than hate extinguishes, and men grow better as the world grows old

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears

Quote.Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote.QuoteValue: Let there be many windows to your soul, that all the glory of the world may beautify it

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a certain androgyny to my appeal

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have huge hands and feet. I'm 5'6" and wear a size 10 shoe

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Men who love their mothers treat women wonderfully. And they have enormous respect for women

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is a matter of giving away secrets

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: Old is the new sexy

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: People tend to remember my performances, not me

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: My husband thinks he's compromising if we have one cook instead of three

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: A successful marriage isn't necessarily one that lasts until you're dead

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have skinny genes. My mother weighs 90 pounds

Quote.Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to do a television show in New York City

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: The perfection of Christian character depends wholly upon the grace and strength found alone in God

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: The great moral powers of the soul are faith, hope, and love

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: Every act, every deed of justice and mercy and benevolence, makes heavenly music in Heaven

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: If you lose Heaven, you lose everything; if you gain Heaven, you gain everything

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: The words of Christ are of more worth than the opinions of all the physicians in the universe

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: God is love, and His law is love. Its two great principles are love to God and love to man

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: True generosity is too frequently eaten up by prosperity and riches

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: All our words and acts are passing in review before God

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: A person whose mind is quiet and satisfied in God is in the pathway to health

Quote.Author: Ellen G. White
Quote.QuoteValue: God's promises are all on condition of humble obedience

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: Women don't take care of themselves because they take care of everybody else

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning about the way people process information and their emotions is hugely helpful to my work

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I am who I am, a Southie

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to teach my daughter the importance of exercising and eating healthy as she grows up

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in putting on airs. I call it like I see it

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting can be an amazingly cathartic thing - especially for young girls

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't really judge characters, because that's when it gets really hard to play them

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't want to be self-obsessed

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I read a lot of nonfiction - especially books about the brain

Quote.Author: Ellen Pompeo
Quote.QuoteValue: I went up a pants size during my pregnancy

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel more confident if my makeup looks good

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: I love pink - pink's my favourite. I hardly ever - weirdly - wear it, but I love the colour pink

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: Apparently I'm introspective... levelheaded... but at the same time, absolutely insane

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a like girly-girl, really, I like flowery stuff
